ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL!  Thanks Jessica ... Thanks *everyone* for all the cool responses. I do not seek this duel, but I won t back down when he challenges me. For the record (if
ygData.messageBody:
LOL! Thanks Jessica ... Thanks *everyone* for all the
cool responses.

I do not seek this duel, but I won't back down when he
challenges me.

For the record (if I win) I won't kill him with his
pet. A jerk he may be, but he is my guild brother.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife


--- "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...> wrote:
> Lyrnia suggested:
> > Few tips:
> >
> > 1) Do not group with him
> > 2) Charm him and make him attack his pet (he
> can't cast
> > spells at all, pet
> > may even kill him before charm wears off)
> > 3) Rinse and repeat
> >
>
> If you wish to pay him back for being a jerk without
> causing him to loose
> experience, have hotkeyed something like:
>
> /say "Wow! You really DO have great pets!"
> /em cringes as he watches the poor little mage get
> torn to shreads
> /say "Did that hurt? Because it looked like it
> hurt."
>
> and for laughs
>
> /pet who leader
>
> But do let him suicide his pet before it kills him.
>
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
>
>
>
